lines.text:
[upon meeting the jockey]
My, he's a cute little fella - reminds me of a doll I had when I was a child. 'Used to take it to bed with me.
I didn't think you spoke English!
You're not going to bet a thousand dollars on a horse!
Well, I wouldn't bet it on a human!
It reminds me that a little man with money can be very, very big.
If you were a woman, I'd hire you as a paid companion.
Why do I must be a woman for that?
Thank you, Mr. Smith! I thank you from the heart of my bottom!
What'd you think the Mediterranean was, glue?
